name: 3rd International Conference on AI, Machine Learning and Applications
content: 3rd International Conference on AI, Machine Learning and Applications (AIMLA 2023) February 25 \~ 26, 2023, Vancouver, Canada https://www.ccnet2023.org/aimla/index Scope &Topics 3rd International Conference on AI, Machine Learning and Applications (AIMLA 2023) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. The Conference looks for significant contributions to all major fields of the Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning in theoretical and practical aspects. The aim of the Conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of AI, ML and Applications. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to the following • Unsupervised Machine Learning • Supervised Machine Learning • Reinforcement Learning • Predictive Learning • Neural Networks • Machine Learning Algorithms • Learning Problems • Learning Methods and analysis • Learning in knowledge-intensive systems • Deep Learning • Data mining • Computer Vision • Bayesian Network • Web Intelligence Applications & Search • Software & Hardware Architectures • Soft computing theory and Applications • Semantic Web Techniques and Technologies • Robotics • Recent Trends and Developments • Reasoning and Evolution • Artificial Intelligence Tools and Application • Programming Languages • Pervasive Computing and Ambient Intelligence • Pattern Recognition • Parallel Processing • Natural Language Processing • Multimedia & Cognitive Informatics • Mechatronics • Knowledge-based Systems • Knowledge Representation • Intelligent System Architecture • Information Retrieval • Hybrid Intelligent Systems • Heuristic and AI Planning Strategies and Tools • Fuzzy Logic • Data Mining and Machine Learning Tools • Computer Vision and Speech Understanding • Computational Theories of Learning • CAD Design and Testing • Bioinformatics • Automatic Control • AI Algorithms Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 04, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from AIMLA 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • Machine Learning and Applications: An International Journal (MLAIJ) • International Journal of Artificial Intelligence & Applications (IJAIA) • International Journal on Soft Computing (IJSC) • International Journal on Soft Computing, Artificial Intelligence and Applications (IJSCAI) • Advances in Vision Computing: An International Journal (AVC) Important Dates Second Batch : (Submissions after January 07, 2023) • Submission Deadline : February 04, 2023 • Authors Notification : February 14, 2023 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : February 19, 2023 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : aimla@ccnet2023.org (or) aimlaconf@yahoo.com For other details: https://www.ccnet2023.org/aimla/index Paper Submission Link: https://www.ccnet2023.org/submission/index.php
